thread.title: Victor Moses trolled by team mates at Chelsea training today (videos)
thread.title_full: Victor Moses trolled by team mates at Chelsea training today (videos)

author: Ben Green
title: Victor Moses trolled by team mates at Chelsea training today (videos)
text:
Victor Moses trolled by team mates at Chelsea training today (videos) By Ben Green   Chelsea heading to Spurs looking for 14 in a row 
Is all ok in the Chelsea camp? 
You would think so after 13 Premier League wins in a row, that have simply been incredible and blown away the rest of England’s top flight. 
One of the key players in this run has been Victor Moses – a winger who for so long was owned by Chelsea but simply loaned out for playing time. 
This season, Moses has grown into a huge player for Chelsea, where he looks a perfect fit for the right wing back position. Is Victor Moses being bullied? 
On Monday, as Chelsea prepare for what is a massive game at Tottenham on Wednesday evening, both John Terry and Marcos Alonso appear to have ganged up on Moses. 
The Chelsea pair have both uploaded videos to Instagram Stories taking the piss out of his flip-flops. 
Even for Chelsea fans, these videos get a little awkward and it seems strange that both Terry and Alonso would delight in making Moses feel uncomfortable. John Terry’s video on Instagram Stories John Terry (filming) not impressed with Victor Moses' foot wear pic.twitter.com/gqdVtFPZVI 
— 101 Great Goals (@102greatgoals) January 2, 2017 Marcos Alonso’s video on Instagram Stories Marcos Alonso also not impressed with Victor Moses' foot wear pic.twitter.com/uqmOwlSOEW 
— 101 Great Goals (@102greatgoals) January 2, 2017 Loading tags...
